errors.error_description: Installation section includes unnecessary system dependencies (libxml2-dev, libxslt1-dev, python3-dev) that are not actually required for tablib
correction_candidates: Remove the system dependencies line and keep only: pip install tablib
Replace with: sudo apt-get install python3-pip && pip install tablib
Change to: pip install --upgrade pip && pip install tablib
errors.golden_answer: Remove the system dependencies line and keep only: pip install tablib
